ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(10) > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > footer:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(2)
html > body > footer:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(4)
